describe: Tajikistan is a mountainous, landlocked country in Central Asia, known for its rugged terrain, rich cultural heritage, and historical significance along the Silk Road. It shares borders with Afghanistan, China, Kyrgyzstan, and Uzbekistan.

cities.name: 🌳 Dushanbe
cities.geographical_location: Located in the western part of Tajikistan, in the Hissar Valley.
cities.climate: Dushanbe has a Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

cities.name: 🏰 Khujand
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the northern part of Tajikistan, in the Fergana Valley.
cities.climate: Khujand experiences a continental climate with hot summers and cold winters.

cities.name: 🏙 Khorog
cities.geographical_location: Located in the eastern part of Tajikistan, in the Pamir Mountains.
cities.climate: Khorog has a cold desert climate with long, cold winters and short, warm summers.
